alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 9:25AM CST until further notice by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Alabama... Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam affecting Wilcox, Monroe and Dallas Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam. * WHEN...From Saturday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 68.0 feet, Millers Ferry Park begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Friday the stage was 54.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue rising to a crest of 71.9 feet Monday evening. - Flood stage is 66.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
